name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Tuo Qingming, deputy to the National People's Congress and president of the Ya'an Education Examination Institute of Sichuan Province, suggested that free medical care be implemented for citizens under the age of 6 and over the age of 75.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It’s not my credit, it’s the delivery guy’s credit
It’s not that I speak out that will change, but that society will change if everyone is willing to speak up for others

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 4, the media reported that many colleges and universities called on graduates to actively seek employment and not just focus on further studies and civil service exams. This caused netizens to complain: "It is clearly a problem of the system and resource allocation, but you insist on saying it is a problem of the graduates. You are really something."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 4, Jining, Shandong
After the car accident at Dezhou Primary School, "observation towers" were used at the entrances of primary schools
In the video, some children stood on the elevator to observe the surrounding situation when they were leaving school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 3, Guangdong.
A car on an elevated bridge almost collided with a motorcycle coming from behind when changing lanes. The motorcycle then reached out and hammered the car window, and then the car directly hit the motorcycle and drove away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Good job"
On March 4, a blogger questioned in a live broadcast that the 2024 CCTV Spring Festival Gala poster was suspected of using Japanese fonts. And the "0" in 2024 looks like the Japanese flag.
It was also pointed out that the "龘" in "龙行龘龘" came from the Qing Dynasty dictionary, questioning whether the CCTV Spring Festival Gala used such a meaning to reflect that we are now in the Qing Dynasty

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 5, Premier Li Qiang stated in the government work report that the minimum standard for basic pension for urban and rural residents would be increased by 20 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As soon as the news came out, a large number of netizens left comments mocking it.
Netizens said "there are many ways to insult"
Farmers have paid public grain every year for so many years, and in the end they only get 150 a month.
This is the biggest injustice I have ever seen.
Some people also asked in the comment area to reduce the treatment of civil servants and cadres

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of now, all major media outlets have turned on the selection mode in the comment sections regarding this news.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @g_w_1 will report to the State Council tomorrow

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 4, Wang Guangfa, member of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference and director of the Department of Respiratory and Critical Care Medicine at Peking University First Hospital, said in an interview that free medical care is just a beautiful ideal. With my country's current level of development and population, it is not feasible to implement universal free medical care.
Netizens said: "Then can you give us a little bit?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/CSkkkE8JiY

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 3, Dai Caili, deputy to the National People's Congress and vice president of China University of Petroleum (East China), said in an interview that the popularity of "Shanhe University" actually reflects the current situation of uneven distribution of high-quality higher education resources in the country.
In a media poll on whether to hope that "Shanhe University" would be established, 75% of voters expressed support.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, students from Baoding University in Hebei Province posted a video complaining that the classroom was full of cameras, which was very oppressive. The video showed that there was a camera above each seat pointing at the students.
On March 4, a staff member from the Academic Affairs Office of Baoding University said: This is a professional classroom used for calligraphy and painting exams, and the camera will not be turned on during class.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the School of Medicine of Southeast University has notified medical students not to forward, discuss or like the suicide incident of a resident trainee at Hunan Provincial People's Hospital on social media, and at the same time organized students to undergo psychological screening.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/hKXJYuUsvJ

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 5, the Beihai Hotel in Qingdao, Shandong, illegally enclosed land to build a parking lot, causing inconvenience to nearby residents and directly blocking their way to the hospital and school.
A leader wearing a party badge at the scene arrogantly pointed at the citizens who came to defend their rights and threatened: "I tell you, if you were buried ten years ago, you wouldn't even know it."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 1, in Linyi, Shandong, the Shanshui Longcheng residential complex in Pingyi County delayed the delivery of its apartments, and a large number of owners gathered outside the sales office, holding banners to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 5, Anshan, Liaoning. The property management of Meixin Manor in Xiliu Town did not take action, so the owners gathered together and held banners, shouting "Beat the black property management, get out of our home" to protect their rights. It is understood that the community had previously had security guards drinking and beating people, and transformers exploded and caught fire many times. 
One owner said, "The property management did not take action and has exploited the owners for 10 years. Now the owners finally have to live for themselves."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/5wTNLpRQfN

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/IxLyEsKfUX

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Many companies in Wuhan are no longer hiring workers over 35 years old.
